== Not ready participating countries ==
In this section are the countries who were in the list of participating countries which have not provided sufficient information to show they are ready. If a country is not ready, the CentralNotice will not be activated. Behind the country name is mentioned the reason why this country is on hold. The local team has then the opportunity to fix the issues.
